name: Draw the platformer
description:
In this game, the pen really is mightier than the sword. Create platforms to solve puzzles! Use different pen colors to defeat enemies and erase walls! Can you beat all 64 levels without running out of ink?

—————— CONTROLS ——————

Arrow keys/WAD — Move

Click and drag — Draw

Space — Switch pen (after level 20)

R — Restart, regain ink at 0%

Z — Skip forward a level

X — Skip backward a level

C — View level help screen

P — Pause (or restart secret mode)

—————— FAQ ——————

• "How do I beat this level?" — Press C to view the help screen. If you're really having trouble, press Z to skip.

• "How do I erase?" — You can press R to restart the level. You also gain an eraser on level 25.

• "I've run out of ink!" — If you have 0% ink, restart the level with R and it'll restore 25%.
